Package org.openpnp.vision

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FluentCv
    A fluent API for some of the most commonly used OpenCV primitives.
    LensCalibration
    Performs OpenCV based lens calibration based on the techniques described in: http://opencv-java-tutorials.readthedocs.org/en/latest/09-camera-calibration.html http://docs.opencv.org/2.4/doc/tutorials/calib3d/camera_calibration/camera_calibration.html https://github.com/Itseez/opencv/blob/master/samples/cpp/tutorial_code/calib3d/camera_calibration /camera_calibration.cpp FishEye model code is included but unfinished.
    Ransac  
    Ransac.Line  
    SimpleHistogram
    Very simple histogram with zero knowledge about the range.
    TemplateImage
    A simple wrapper for a vision template image.
